definition: piece of writing submitted for publication/manuscript/article
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Remuneration will be give to the writers within one month after the article is officially published.
sentences.chinese: 文章稿酬在稿件正式发布后一个月内发放。

sentences.english: A CMJ editor reviews submitted manuscripts initially.
sentences.chinese: 阿CMJ最初的编辑评论稿件。

sentences.english: If tampers with the manuscript to originate arbitrarily, this net will hold responsible legally.
sentences.chinese: 如擅自篡改稿件来源，本网将依法追究责任。

sentences.english: These papers can be regarded as 5 series of papers compressed simplify edition.
sentences.chinese: 这篇稿件可以看作是5篇系列论文的压缩精简版。

sentences.english: He sent the draft to the censor 's office by a runner.
sentences.chinese: 他让信使把稿件送到新闻检查官办公室。

sentences.english: The article may have some inappropriate parts, please correct them.
sentences.chinese: 这份稿件容或有不当之处，望请您多指正。

sentences.english: This study was also selected by the American Society for Nutrition to be featured in a press release.
sentences.chinese: 该研究还被美国营养学会选登在一篇新闻稿件中。

sentences.english: Janet fixed copies and edited books for a variety of publishers.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮特曾为不同的出版商审订稿件和编辑图书。

sentences.english: However, many submissions remind us that there is still significant room for improvement in terms of conducting high-quality research.
sentences.chinese: 然而，很多稿件与高质量研究间仍有一定的距离。

sentences.english: Please make a fair copy of the manuscript.
She is also in charge of editing most translation works for the company.
sentences.chinese: 负责天语公司大部分中英互译稿件的终稿审定。

sentences.english: Indeed, that was the danger which, for weeks to follow, Banneker skirted .
sentences.chinese: 的确危险，陆续几周，班纳克的稿件不见报。

sentences.english: The unbound sheets of paper were piled up on the table.
sentences.chinese: 还没有装订成册的论文稿件堆放在桌子上。

sentences.english: Second, the good at solicits contributions and monitors the manuscript.
It could not be an acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 那不可能是接受稿件的信。

sentences.english: All Ads should not be changed or canceled after the deadline.
sentences.chinese: 所有广告在截稿期后，不得取消或更改稿件。

definition: to forward (a shipment)/to reprint sth published elsewhere/Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 zai4]
the author takes sole responsibility for the views expressed here (disclaimer)
to submit articles for publication/to contribute (writing)
this text/article/the main body of a book
fee paid to an author for a piece of writing
